title: Are WNBA players underpaid?
content: Yes, WNBA players got paid less than $80,000 averagely in 2019â€“20, while NBA players earned $7.4 million averagely in the same period.

title: Ice Cube offer unique ownership opportunity in his BIG3 basketball league.
content: It's 21st century ownership. There are two ownership options totaling 1000 additions 25 fire price at $25-K each, and 975 gold price at $5-K each.

title: Is the concussion protocol being followed in the NFL?
content: No look at Tua Tagovailoa, Dolphins needs to be sued!

title: What are the highest paid team sports for women
content: Soccer and WNBA players have highest earnings. Female athletes get paid more from individual sports such as tennis and golf.
